entry.title: Thursday night: Light snow. Low minus 26.
entry.summary: Light snow ending this evening then clearing. Local blowing snow. Wind northwest 40 km/h gusting to 60. Low minus 26. Wind chill minus 22 this evening and minus 40 overnight. Frostbite in minutes. Forecast issued 3:30 PM EST Thursday 12 January 2023
